# Purpose
The following notebook documents the look-up table used to replace text encoding errors.

# Define Tables
The values for the encoding error and pattern replacement vectors must be entered in the same order.

## Replacement Patterns
```{r repalcement_patterns}
# Define replacement patterns for encoding errors
encoding_replacement <- c(
  "'",  
  "'s", 
  "'s", 
  "'", 
  "=", 
  "=",
  "performance", 
  "performance",
  '"',
  '"',
```

# Export
```{r}
# Save to System Data
usethis::use_data(
  encoding_errors,
  encoding_replacement,
  internal  = TRUE,
  overwrite = TRUE
  )
```
